entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 10:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending before morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm except 10 mm along the southern shore. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
